name: Arctic World War (17+) - eXtreme Winter Warfare Sniper Soldier
name_original: Arctic World War (17+) - eXtreme Winter Warfare Sniper Soldier
description:
** EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** ACTION PACKED SHOOTING GAME! **

It's -30 celsius and you're the last of your elite arctic sniper squad. Armed with only your sniper rifle, you're up against an entire army as you try and make your way out.

Will you make it? Your fate is entirely in your hands!

GAME FEATURES

> Cool winter combat graphics.
> Awesome FPS type game play.
> Rocking sound track!
